RelativeTemporalAnnotation.TEXT: ADMISSION DATE : 20041012 DISCHARGE DATE : 20041015 ASSOCIATED PROCEDURES OR OPERATIONS : POSTPARTUM DIAGNOSTIC PROCEDURES : None OTHER POSTPARTUM THERAPIES : Antimicrobial Therapy HISTORY AND REASON FOR HOSPITALIZATION : Srom In Labor HOSPITAL COURSE ( include complications if any ) : This 21 year old Gravida 2 Para 0010 was admitted to the Life Valley Medical Center Obstetrical service on 10/12/2004 at 08:41 am for the indication ( s ) : srom in labor .
